trans-unit.source: Policies to protect Windows PCs| Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Policies to protect Windows PCs| Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use these policies to help you ensure the security of Windows PCs when they are managed by the Intune client software.
trans-unit.target: Use these policies to help you ensure the security of Windows PCs when they are managed by the Intune client software.

trans-unit.source: Use policies to help protect Windows PCs that run the Intune client software
trans-unit.target: Use policies to help protect Windows PCs that run the Intune client software

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune offers three policies that you can use to help ensure the security of Windows PCs that the [Intune client software](manage-windows-pcs-with-microsoft-intune.md) manages.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune offers three policies that you can use to help ensure the security of Windows PCs that the [Intune client software](manage-windows-pcs-with-microsoft-intune.md) manages.

trans-unit.source: Intune makes it easy for you to [keep Windows PCs that you manage up-to-date](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md) by informing you when important software updates from Microsoft and other companies are available.
trans-unit.target: Intune makes it easy for you to [keep Windows PCs that you manage up-to-date](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md) by informing you when important software updates from Microsoft and other companies are available.

trans-unit.source: You can then approve or decline these updates.
trans-unit.target: You can then approve or decline these updates.

trans-unit.source: Approved updates will automatically be installed on all applicable PCs.
trans-unit.target: Approved updates will automatically be installed on all applicable PCs.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Firewall helps to keep hackers, malware, and other threats from Windows PCs.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Firewall helps to keep hackers, malware, and other threats from Windows PCs.

trans-unit.source: With Intune, you can [manage settings and features for the Windows Firewall](help-protect-windows-pcs-using-windows-firewall-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md) on all PCs that you manage.
trans-unit.target: With Intune, you can [manage settings and features for the Windows Firewall](help-protect-windows-pcs-using-windows-firewall-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md) on all PCs that you manage.

trans-unit.source: As an IT admin, one of your top priorities is to [keep the Windows PCs that you manage free of malware and viruses](help-secure-windows-pcs-with-endpoint-protection-for-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: As an IT admin, one of your top priorities is to [keep the Windows PCs that you manage free of malware and viruses](help-secure-windows-pcs-with-endpoint-protection-for-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: Intune integrates with Endpoint Protection to provide real-time protection against malware threats, keep malware definitions up-to date, and automatically scan computers.
trans-unit.target: Intune integrates with Endpoint Protection to provide real-time protection against malware threats, keep malware definitions up-to date, and automatically scan computers.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint Protection also provides tools that help you to manage and monitor malware attacks.
trans-unit.target: Endpoint Protection also provides tools that help you to manage and monitor malware attacks.

trans-unit.source: [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md)
trans-unit.target: [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md)
